name: AMAZED (itch) (OwenBOSS)
description:
WELCOME  TO  AMAZE

    Explore the maze. You spawn in the red room and your goal is to reach the green room. Upon touching the green cube the maze will reset with a new random layout every time. NOTE: The first maze takes a while to generate. Please wait 1-2 minutes. I am working on resolving the issue, sorry for the inconvenience.

DOWNLOADABLE  EDDITION

    You can download the game here (has sound!): [COMING SOON]

ROAD  MAP

    Amaze is at a place where I feel comfortable moving to other projects. However, there are a few things I'd like to add in the future. My main goal is to improve the visual appeal of the game and this page. I want to practice finishing and polishing a game. Please leave suggestions in the comments.

  • Jumping
  • More music and sounds
  • Different maze generators
  • Better UI 
  • Player selects the type of maze
  • Enemies
  • Chests
  • Puzzles
  • Improved graphics and VFX
